kpi.name: M5000C6

kpi_info.title: DROPPED MAC-D PDUS DUE TO BTS OVERFLOW
kpi_info.use: Number of dropped MAC-d PDUs due to BTS buffer overflow. UPDATED:The counter is incremented by BTS when MAC-d PDU dropped from BTS buffer prior Discard Timer expiry, i.e. due to overflow of the buffer.

kpi.kpi_alias: DROPPED MAC-D PDUS DUE TO BTS OVERFLOW
